import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Search process instances"}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/process-instances/search"}
  context={"endpoint"}
></MethodEndpoint>

Search process instances

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails parameters={undefined}></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{
    description: "Search process instances",
    content: {
      "application/json": {
        schema: {
          type: "object",
          properties: {
            filter: {
              type: "object",
              properties: {
                key: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                processVersion: { type: "integer", format: "int32" },
                bpmnProcessId: { type: "string" },
                parentKey: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                parentFlowNodeInstanceKey: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                startDate: { type: "string" },
                endDate: { type: "string" },
                state: {
                  type: "string",
                  enum: ["ACTIVE", "COMPLETED", "CANCELED"],
                },
                processDefinitionKey: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                tenantId: { type: "string" },
                parentProcessInstanceKey: "circular(ProcessInstance)",
              },
              title: "ProcessInstance",
            },
            size: { type: "integer", format: "int32" },
            searchAfter: { type: "array", items: { type: "object" } },
            sort: {
              type: "array",
              items: {
                type: "object",
                properties: {
                  field: { type: "string" },
                  order: { type: "string", enum: ["ASC", "DESC"] },
                },
                title: "Sort",
              },
            },
          },
          title: "QueryProcessInstance",
        },
        examples: {
          All: {
            description:
              "Returns all process instances (default return list size is 10)",
            value: {},
          },
          "Sorted by field": {
            description:
              "Returns process instances sorted ascending by bpmnProcessId",
            value: { sort: [{ field: "bpmnProcessId", order: "ASC" }] },
          },
          "Sorted and paged with size": {
            description:
              "Returns max 3 process instances after 'bigVarProcess' and key 6755399441055870 sorted ascending by bpmnProcessId \nTo get the next page copy the value of 'sortValues' into 'searchAfter' value.\nSort specification should match the searchAfter specification",
            value: {
              size: 3,
              sort: [{ field: "bpmnProcessId", order: "ASC" }],
              searchAfter: ["bigVarProcess", 6755399441055870],
            },
          },
          "Filtered and sorted": {
            description:
              "Returns max 50 process instances, filtered by processVersion of 2 sorted ascending by bpmnProcessId",
            value: {
              filter: { processVersion: 2 },
              size: 50,
              sort: [{ field: "bpmnProcessId", order: "ASC" }],
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    required: true,
  }}
></RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}

      content: {
        "application/json": {
          schema: {
            type: "object",
            properties: {
              items: {
                type: "array",
                items: {
                  type: "object",
                  properties: {
                    key: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                    processVersion: { type: "integer", format: "int32" },
                    bpmnProcessId: { type: "string" },
                    parentKey: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                    parentFlowNodeInstanceKey: {
                      type: "integer",
                      format: "int64",

                      type: "string",

                    },
                    processDefinitionKey: { type: "integer", format: "int64" },
                    tenantId: { type: "string" },
                    parentProcessInstanceKey: "circular(ProcessInstance)",
                  },

                },
              },
              sortValues: { type: "array", items: { type: "object" } },
